content: this is a crochet pattern and video tutorial 1 showing how to crochet an easy cozy scarf using the beautiful granny stitch crochet pattern this is a beginner friendly series and this scarf is great project to pair with watching your favorite tv show or movie use a soft tape measure to measure as you go and stop at the length desired working in a color block pattern you ll want to count once you ve reached this measurement just to make sure the blocks are of even row use your favorite worsted weight yarn and with 4 sizes included you can make one for everybody in the family **materials ** - 108 196 298 425 yards of worsted weight yarn i used red heart super saver in total that s 36 66 100 142 yards of each color if 3 is desired - h8/5mm crochet hook - tapestry needle - optional tape measure to check gauge if essential to you or to measure as you go **time spent ** this adult small scarf took just under 3 hours **sizes ** toddler child adult small and adult large **gauge ** not essential & measured in pattern **abbreviations us ** -
